name: No Time For Caution (Amanuel Seifu)
description:
Dock back onto the Endurance in this cinematic experience replicating the famous docking scene in the movie Interstellar.  This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. Playing on full screen is recommended.

Controls:

Up/Down Arrow - Raising and lowering ship

Left/Right Arrow - Rotate the ship
